sen.e: Until the Muromachi Period, more people collectively called the two books and Sendai Kujihongi (Ancient Japanese History) as 'Sanbu no honsho' (three books of origin) which was an important historical books telling Japanese myths and ancient history, but 'Sanbu no honsho' was thought to be an apocryphal book in the Edo Period and after that, more people called only these two books as Kiki.
